m2mimud.state
Interface MapViewer

All Known Implementing Classes:
MapWindow
public interface MapViewer

The MapViewer interface is for objects who wish to be notifed about the area around the player, i.e. so they can displaya map

Method Detail

updateMap

void updateMap(java.lang.String[] newValues,
               XYloc loc)
Tells this object to update its map values

Parameters:
newValues - A string array which contains the new values of the map. The assumption is that the values are indexed using the direction symbols.
loc - The new loction of the player

updateTime

void updateTime(int newTime)
Informs the object that the time has changed

Parameters:
newTime - the integer time for the new time
